    • getOrCreateLobby

      @VisibleForTesting protected ServerLobbyAndController<ServerLobby> getOrCreateLobby(String nick)
      Implementation Note:
      to be as fast as possible, this method does not hold any of the lobby-specific locks while checking if the given player can join it. It is up to the caller to re-check inside a lock that the ServerLobby#canOnePlayerJoin() condition still holds true.

    • runOnOnlyLobbyLocks
